Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."REV_MAINT_SAVEBUDGETDEF" ( in_clntcode IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, in_projid IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, budgetratesourcelabor NUMBER , budgetcostsourcelabor NUMBER , budgetratelocationlabor NUMBER , budgetrateoverridelabor NUMBER , budgetcostsourcematerials NUMBER , budgetratesourcematerials NUMBER , budgetratelocationmaterials NUMBER , budgetrateoverridematerials NUMBER , budgetcostsourceequipment NUMBER , budgetratesourceequipment NUMBER , budgetratelocationequipment NUMBER , budgetrateoverrideequipment NUMBER , budgetlevellabor NUMBER , budgetlevelmaterial NUMBER , budgetlevelequipment NUMBER ) AS COMPANY_CODE GLOBALPKG.STRING; PROJECT_CODE GLOBALPKG.STRING; StoO_selcnt INTEGER; StoO_error INTEGER; StoO_rowcnt INTEGER; StoO_crowcnt INTEGER := 0; StoO_fetchstatus INTEGER := 0; StoO_errmsg GLOBALPKG.STRING; StoO_sqlstatus INTEGER; retcode NUMBER; BEGIN /* Called From: Procedure :- Trigger :- PMD TransactionId :- WMD ActionId :- Modified By : sundar Modified Date : 07/25/2001 */ rev_maint_savebudgetdef.COMPANY_CODE := rev_maint_savebudgetdef.in_clntcode; rev_maint_savebudgetdef.PROJECT_CODE := rev_maint_savebudgetdef.in_projid; -- rev_maint_savebudgetdef.retcode:=PAC_MNT_VALIDATE_BUDGET_SP(budgetratesourcelabor=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratesourcelabor, PAC_MNT_VALIDATE_BUDGET_SP(budgetratesourcelabor=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratesourcelabor, budgetcostsourcelabor=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetcostsourcelabor, budgetratelocationlabor=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratelocationlabor, budgetrateoverridelabor=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetrateoverridelabor, budgetcostsourcematerials=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetcostsourcematerials, budgetratesourcematerials=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratesourcematerials, budgetratelocationmaterials=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratelocationmaterials, budgetrateoverridematerials=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetrateoverridematerials, budgetcostsourceequipment=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetcostsourceequipment, budgetratesourceequipment=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratesourceequipment, budgetratelocationequipment=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratelocationequipment, budgetrateoverrideequipment=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetrateoverrideequipment, budgetlevellabor=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetlevellabor, budgetlevelmaterial=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetlevelmaterial, budgetlevelequipment=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetlevelequipment, retcode=>rev_maint_savebudgetdef.retcode); IF rev_maint_savebudgetdef.retcode = -1 THEN RETURN ; END IF; StoO_error := 0; StoO_rowcnt := 0; UPDATE pac_mnt_projects SET budgetratesourcelabor = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratesourcelabor, budgetcostsourcelabor = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetcostsourcelabor, budgetratelocationlabor = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratelocationlabor, budgetrateoverridelabor = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetrateoverridelabor, budgetcostsourcematerials = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetcostsourcematerials, budgetratesourcematerials = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratesourcematerials, budgetratelocationmaterials = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratelocationmaterials, budgetrateoverridematerials = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetrateoverridematerials, budgetcostsourceequipment = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetcostsourceequipment, budgetratesourceequipment = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratesourceequipment, budgetratelocationequipment = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetratelocationequipment, budgetrateoverrideequipment = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetrateoverrideequipment, budgetlevellabor = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetlevellabor, budgetlevelmaterial = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetlevelmaterial, budgetlevelequipment = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.budgetlevelequipment WHERE COMPANY_CODE = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.COMPANY_CODE AND PROJECT_CODE = rev_maint_savebudgetdef.PROJECT_CODE; END rev_maint_savebudgetdef;
